title: New: Rosie Carney – Better Man
body:
Heart-wrenchingly beautiful.

Very, very excited to hear more from Ireland’s **Rosie Carney**.

_I was the anchor that slept in your sand / how can we sail if you’re stuck to this land_

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
